tweet.text: In July 1976, Queen Elizabeth arrived in Washington, D.C. for the U.S. Bicentennial celebrations. For the planning of the Queen’s visit as well as Ford’s remarks upon her arrival, please peruse: https://t.co/4EaaxYaLeb (2/3) https://t.co/swNpsvzMeM
